problem.markdown:
num_1 = ""
num_temp = ""
num_final = ""

while True:
    num_1 = input("Enter an integer: ")
    if num_1.isdigit():
        num_final = num_temp + num_1
        num_temp = num_final
    else:
        print(num_final)
        break

What is the output of from running the above code using the following input at the Enter an integer: prompt ?

1st input: 3  
2nd input: 4
3rd input: five
4th input: 6

( ) 34five (x) 34 ( ) 34five6 ( ) 7

pre.code:
num_1 = "" num_temp = "" num_final = ""
while True: num_1 = input("Enter an integer: ") if num_1.isdigit(): num_final = num_temp + num_1 num_temp = num_final else: print(num_final) break

multiplechoiceresponse.p: What is the output of from running the above code using the following input at the Enter an integer: prompt ?
